title: Topics in Marketing
description: Introduces advanced topics of special interest in marketing. Instructional methods include face-to-face lecture, case presentations, assigned readings, and group discussions. May be taken for credit four times, for a maximum of sixteen units if the topics are significantly different. Students may not earn credit for both MGT 489 and MGT 209 if the course has the same course subtitle. They are course equivalents. Prerequisites: MBA student or consent of instructor and department stamp.
